extensionAdditionalInfo.info: This extension contains a unit test action for running PHPUnit unit tests.

actionInfo.name: Execute PHPUnit Tests
actionInfo.summary: Runs PHPUnit tests on the specified test, test file, or all tests in the specified directory.

extensionAdditionalInfo.actionInfo:
Action Fields

Test to Run

The name of the test or test file to run. Leave this field blank to run all tests in the directory.

Additional Arguments

Any additional arguments that will be supplied to the PHPUnit script.

Group Name

The group name allows you to easily identify the unit test if you would like to split tests into different groups.
